item.title: How could this work?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:2, topic:298930”] if (command.startsWith("shop")) { if (!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kenshin")) { return; } openUpShop(Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5))); }

It’ll work if it’s wL.[/quote]
No errors
Ty very much.

item.title: How could this work?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, basically what this code would do if it was “compatable” types between the wanneshop and shp, is open up the shop. How could i make so that it acually compiles and works?

if(command.startsWith("shop")) {
    String shp = command.substring(5);
if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("kenshin")) {
return;
}
WanneShop = shp; 
}
